pkgmetadata.longdescription: pathtools=========Pattern matching and various utilities for file systems paths.Installing----------As simple as: python3 -m pip install --upgrade --user pathtools3Or from sources: python3 -m pip install -e .Testing-------Requirements: python3 -m pip install pytest pytest-covAnd then: python3 -m pytestDeploying---------For the maintainer, you will need to install wheel: python3 -m pip install wheelAnd the command to distribute the module is: python3 setup.py sdist bdist_wheel upload
